# Getting Started with `rspsp`
`rspsp` (R *sp*atial *sp*ectral analysis) contains tools for analyzing spatial lattice data. Its main features include:
\begin{enumerate}
  \item Test statistics for modelling assumptions
  \item Diagnostic tools for assessing the spectrum
  \item Samplers for random data
\end{enumerate}
